text: it's been 18 years since I last visited
the beautiful country of Switzerland I
was only nine years old at the time but
the memories are so vivid there's
something almost supernatural about the
atmosphere a remarkable feeling that had
a lasting impact on me similar to that
magical feeling Iike as a child when he
first visit Disneyland although it
wasn't fairies giant castles nor the
enchanted classical music playing in the
background but it was the mountains the
sound of cowbells and the unique
landscapes that linger and my
transcendental memories after coming
back to this place almost two decades
later I'm able to reconfirm the magic in
these mountains the peacefulness of the
small quaint towns has a relaxing yet
cheerful effect on your mood that evokes
such tranquil emotions something
surprisingly similar to the experience
of rural Japan simply put Switzerland is
one of the most beautiful and underrated
places in the world and if you're the
type of person who's into landscapes
nature and mountains then Switzerland
should be at the top of your bucket list
